backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing blog posts, user profiles, and admin/user authorization with CRUD operations and publish toggling.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping logo‑related feature IDs to affected frontend files and associated metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file providing short summaries of major frontend components, pages, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining a warm earth‑tone OKLCH color system for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes and wrapping the UI with theme and layout providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminGate.t: Component that guards admin routes by checking authentication, profile setup, and admin status.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for first‑time profile creation allowing users to enter and save their name.
Responsive footer showing the updated logo, navigation links, contact info, and caffeine.ai attribution.
Responsive site header with logo, navigation links, active state handling, login button, and mobile menu toggle.
Layout wrapper that renders the header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, stored identities, and client initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query hooks for fetching and mutating blog posts, user profiles, and admin status using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining light and dark color themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, react-query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Shows admin stats and navigation cards for managing and creating posts, gated by admin access.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPostEditor: Form page for creating or editing blog posts with fields, validation, and submit handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPostsListP: Lists all posts for admins with publish toggling and links to create or edit posts.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Public blog list page that fetches published posts and displays them with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostDetailPage.ts: Displays a single blog post by slug with loading, error, and not-found states, showing title, date, image, and content.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders contact information cards and a description of the cafe's services.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides a homepage with hero content, service highlights, and calls to action.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, features, requirements, and pending feature requests for the village internet cafe blog site.
